ðŸ“– Summary: ZENO is an open-source node system framework designed for creating and rendering complex 3D simulations. It offers an integrated toolbox with features like volumetric geometry processing, physics solvers, and visualization nodes. ZENO enables users to build sophisticated VFX and simulation solutions through its node-based dataflow programming approach.
